passive.name: Reset
passive.description: Cham Cham's basic abilities are reset when she receives a takedown.

q.name: Catch That!
q.description: Cham Cham throws her boomerang in the designated direction, dealing [120/220/320/430/630/795] damage to the first enemy hit and then returning to Cham Cham. If she catches it, she gains a bonus [20% MS] towards the hit enemy for [3s].

w.name: Grawr!
w.description: Cham Cham's lifesteal increases by [8%] for [4s].

e.name: Flicky Trick
e.description: Cham Cham jumps in the designated direction, able to jump over walls. If her Q ability hits an enemy, she can jump towards that enemy from a great distance.

r.name: Huge Boomerang
r.description: Cham Cham launches a wide and short-range boomerang in the designated direction, dealing [300/510/650/790] damage to all enemies hit, slowing them by [35%], and marking them for [3s]. The Q ability goes on cooldown at the start of the cast. This ability can only be cast if Cham Cham is holding the boomerang.

level1.name: Enhanced Grawr
level1.description: Cham Cham's W grants an additional [5%] lifesteal and [10%] attack speed.

level1.name: Swift Movement
level1.description: Cham Cham gains 40% MS when her boomerang is not in her hand.

level1.name: Defensive Jump
level1.description: After using her E ability, Cham Cham takes [20%] less damage for [3s].

level5.name: Boomerang Mastery
level5.description: Cham Cham's boomerang (Q and R) deals 18% more damage and her Q ability has a [5s cd] reduction.

level5.name: Survival Instinct
level5.description: When Cham Cham's HP drops below 50%, she gains 5% additional lifesteal.

level5.name: Area Damage
level5.description: Cham Cham deals 2% more damage to all nearby enemies.

level10.name: Life Drain
level10.description: Cham Cham's R ability restores 20% of the damage dealt to her immediately.

level10.name: Extended Mark
level10.description: Cham Cham's R ability marks the enemy for [10s].

level15.name: Unstoppable Force
level15.description: Upon activation, Cham Cham becomes unstoppable for [1.5s].

level15.name: Swift Runner
level15.description: Upon activation, Cham Cham gains +35% MS and cannot be slowed.

level20.name: Defensive Strikes
level20.description: Every autoattack Cham Cham lands reduces incoming damage by 0.5% [Max 20%] for [3s].

level20.name: Ability Power
level20.description: After casting an ability, Cham Cham deals 2% more damage [Max 20%] for [3s].

level20.name: Kill Quest
level20.description: QUEST: Participate in 20 kills -> Gain a bonus 10% damage and 3 autoattack shields.

level20.name: Protective Shield
level20.description: When Cham Cham uses her W ability, she gains a [520] shield for [3s]. (Stackable)

changes: Level 5 Talent b: Lifesteal increased from 2% at 35% HP to 5% at 50% HP
Level 1 Talent a: Reworked to grant W an additional [5%] lifesteal and [10%] attack speed
